name: Karate Master
description:
Join Nairuki in the way to rescue her brother from the castle of the 5 Karate Masters.

5 Floors plenty of enemies, magic and final bosses that will make you cry.

This game is currently on development, what you can download is a demo that contains a temporary Menu system and the first floor.

Please consider to donate if you like the game and would like to support me.
